Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Waking Nightmare]{Waking Nightmare}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shared Nightmare]{Shared Nightmare}

You fill minds with horror and dread.
name: Nightmares Domain
